id: [Default] Data Access Security Campaign Assigned To Reviewers
name: Data Access Security Campaign Assigned To Reviewers
description: Notify user that a data access security certification review task is waiting for them.
subject: You have a new certification review task for $campaignAssigned.name
body:
Hi,

A certification review task is waiting for you. The final due date for this task is $campaignAssigned.dueDate.
Please follow the link to view the task.

Additional task details:

Campaign Name: $campaignAssigned.name
Description: $campaignAssigned.description
Instructions: $campaignAssigned.instructions

Thank You!

This is an automated message sent to you by Data Access Security - Please do not reply.
